setDatesFromStartEnd

private void setDatesFromStartEnd(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                           throws java.lang.NumberFormatException
Assign the start and end dates for the graph using start and end request values assuming they are timestamps. If that is not possible a default start and end time are assigned.

Parameters:
request -
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
